content: next round k2tog around 8 sts remain break yarn leaving a long tail to thread through remaining sts pull tight to close top of thumb weave in all ends using these ends to sew up any holes second mitten knitting the second mitten follows the exact same pattern above either mitten can be worn on either hand 2 chart for the bernies not including the ribbed cuff this chart is worked right to left the spaces along the thumb gusset on the right are used to show how the pattern lines up these should just be knit across joining to the main body note the locations of the increases m row 4 has 3 increases two between the markers one after row 7 has three increases between the markers row 10 13 16 19 and 22 each have two increases between the markers 3
